price: 112. Qofka se samo fala oo mu’min ah, ma ka cabsanayo dulmi loo geysto iyo wax loo dhimo midna.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓul'man walā haḍman
